DESCRIPTION: Whenever your team gains #b5 #yBonding, choose #b1 of #b3 random bonuses. The bonuses are stronger variations of potion effects.
Whenever [#60D0D0]You[] or [#60D0D0]Dragon[] attacks, the attacker gains #b1 Aggro. The character with higher Aggro becomes the #yFront, taking all attacks.
The character marked with Front Marker. NL All enemies attack the Front.
The Rear is not normally attacked by enemies.
The #yFront becomes the #yRear, and vice versa. NL Switch happens when the #yAggro of the #yRear becomes higher than the #yFront.
When an enemy is Taunted, it will always attack the Taunter, not the Front.
If [#60D0D0]You[] attack or an enemy attacks [#60D0D0]You[] before the effect kicks in, it is cancelled.
A potion which deals #b30 damage to an enemy.
